krajjat
  • Welcome to Krajjat’s documentation!
  • View page source

Welcome to Krajjat’s documentation!

Krajjat (originally, Kinect Realignment Algorithm for Joint Jumps and Twitches) is a Python toolbox for processing MoCap data (from Kinect v2 or Qualisys systems) and find relationships between the tracked movements and an audio file.

Note

The documentation is currently being built.
